thread.title: SEE IT: Valve employee proposes to his girlfriend using VR
thread.title_full: SEE IT: Valve employee proposes to his girlfriend using VR - NY Daily News

author: NEW YORK DAILY NEWS
title: SEE IT: Valve employee proposes to his girlfriend using VR
text:
A Valve employee used virtual reality to propose to his girlfriend. Proposing to your soulmate with a flash mob performance of "Marry You" by Bruno Mars is so 2010. The new cool way to pop the questions is by using virtual reality.
Chandler Murch, a Valve employee, proposed to his girlfriend Kelly Tortorice by using a VR simulation designed with the company's software.
Tortorice explained on her Facebook page that she was exploring a sunken ship, walking through the Alps and fixing robots when suddenly a virtual engagement ring began floating her way.
